erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$ul: **description**: Mandatory field: The top part > Description* > The description of the numbering series.

**manualNumbering**: The top part > Manual numbering > A check box that indicates (if selected) that the system will not generate numbers for the series and users will need to specify document numbers manually.
**newNumberSymbol**: Mandatory field: The top part > New number symbol* > An alphanumeric string used to indicate that a new number for an object will be assigned.
**numberingId**: Mandatory field: The top part > Numbering ID > The unique ID of the numbering series, which is an alphanumeric string of up to 10 characters.
